data: The invigorating breeze, stirring the leaves of the vines and rambler roses which grew in profusion over the trellis-covered veranda, carried, apparently, no comfort to the man seated there.
THE invigorating breeze, stirring the leaves of the vines and rambler roses which grew in profusion over the trellis-covered veranda, carried, apparently, no comfort to the man seated there.
Lincoln, Natalie Sumner, 1881-1935; Ballinger, Harry Russell, 1892-1993 [Illustrator]
